Uses of Package
com.lmax.solana4j.api

  • Packages that use com.lmax.solana4j.api 
    Package Description
    com.lmax.solana4j
    This package is the base package and is the entrypoint to the library's APIs.
    com.lmax.solana4j.api
    This package defines the library's API.
    com.lmax.solana4j.encoding
    This package exposes the library's API.
    com.lmax.solana4j.programs
    This package contains implementations of interactions with Solana Programs on the Solana Blockchain.
  • Classes in com.lmax.solana4j.api used by com.lmax.solana4j 
    Class Description
    AddressLookupTable
    Interface representing an address lookup table on the Solana blockchain.
    Blockhash
    Interface representing a blockhash on the Solana blockchain.
    InstructionBuilderBase
    Base interface for building instructions for a Solana transaction.
    Message
    Interface representing a Solana message.
    MessageBuilder
    Interface for building messages for the Solana blockchain.
    ProgramDerivedAddress
    Interface representing a program derived address.
    PublicKey
    Interface representing a public key.
    SignedMessageBuilder
    Interface for building signed messages.
    Slot
    Interface representing a Slot.
    TransactionInstruction
    Interface representing a transaction instruction.
  • Classes in com.lmax.solana4j.api used by com.lmax.solana4j.api 
    Class Description
    AccountLookupEntry
    Interface representing an account lookup entry which stores the read only and read write indexes of addresses in an address lookup table.
    AccountLookupEntry.LookupEntry
    Interface representing an address lookup entry, which is the address and it's index within an address lookup table.
    AddressLookupTable
    Interface representing an address lookup table on the Solana blockchain.
    Blockhash
    Interface representing a blockhash on the Solana blockchain.
    ByteBufferSigner
    Interface representing an entity capable of signing transactions represented as ByteBuffer.
    InstructionBuilderBase
    Base interface for building instructions for a Solana transaction.
    Message
    Interface representing a Solana message.
    MessageBuilder
    Interface for building messages for the Solana blockchain.
    MessageBuilderLegacy
    Interface for building legacy messages for the Solana blockchain.
    MessageBuilderV0
    Interface for building V0 messages for the Solana blockchain.
    MessageVisitor
    Interface representing a visitor for reading information about Solana Messages.
    MessageVisitor.AccountLookupView
    Interface representing an account lookup view in the Solana blockchain.
    MessageVisitor.AccountsView
    Interface representing a view of accounts in the Solana blockchain.
    MessageVisitor.InstructionView
    Interface representing an instruction view in the Solana blockchain.
    MessageVisitor.LegacyInstructionView
    Interface representing a legacy instruction view in the Solana blockchain.
    MessageVisitor.MessageView
    Interface representing a view of a message in the Solana blockchain.
    MessageVisitor.V0InstructionView
    Interface representing a V0 instruction view in the Solana blockchain.
    PublicKey
    Interface representing a public key.
    SealedMessageBuilder
    Interface for building sealed messages.
    SignedMessageBuilder
    Interface for building signed messages.
    TransactionBuilder
    Interface for building Solana transactions.
    TransactionInstruction
    Interface representing a transaction instruction.
    TransactionInstruction.AccountReference
    Interface representing a reference to an account in a transaction instruction.
    UnsignedMessageBuilder
    Interface for building unsigned messages.
